SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="81ca12b99fac44c3bd022be1b809170e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hi,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're probably wondering
what a high-school teacher is doing here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81ca12b99fac44c3bd022be1b809170e" Scale="1"/]I came to this planet to supervise a
student field trip, but...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it's not going
so well.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you for rescuing me...
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="c8bd5cc94be74f3fa06a866f289b085a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm sure you're busy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but do you think you
could [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]search for [System:Color name="Default"]the students that came
here with me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c8bd5cc94be74f3fa06a866f289b085a" Scale="1"/]The[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] Alayon Academy's Planetary Science
Club[System:Color name="Default"] only has three students:[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c8bd5cc94be74f3fa06a866f289b085a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]If they aren't found,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't know how I
could ever face their parents.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
if there's any way you could help...
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="9f677e08003242099be1e265a2a61bba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Do you think all of my students are OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I know there's not much use in fretting
about it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f677e08003242099be1e265a2a61bba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]It's just that...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]the more I try not to think
about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more awful things I imagine...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I can't help but fear the worst!
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="3839f1d5183647fb98558636aaf2e87c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]My students in the Planetary Science Club
are good kids.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] They were so excited for
this field trip.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3839f1d5183647fb98558636aaf2e87c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]If I don't bring all three of them back
safely,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what will I tell their parents?!
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="e10ef3f4abcd4906bf4e1857937de677" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I became a teacher this year,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right out of
college.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I still don't feel like I
know what I'm doing half the time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e10ef3f4abcd4906bf4e1857937de677" Scale="1"/]And now I've put my students in danger...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e10ef3f4abcd4906bf4e1857937de677" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Agh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] This is just so awful!
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="52869442fdda401183dfbdb01113edfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I know I spend a lot of time apologizing...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's just that I feel so helpless and lost.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="52869442fdda401183dfbdb01113edfc" Scale="1"/]I knew I wasn't the type of person who
could be successful as a teacher.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not a
good leader.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now look what's happened.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="e164080f49ed40e2a118f17ca871455e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You rescued all three of them...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's
wonderful![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can't thank you enough.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="9f2b3732307d4a18bd0efb8ec390285d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm disappointed with myself for being
such an unreliable supervisor.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f2b3732307d4a18bd0efb8ec390285d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But I can take responsibility now for
getting my students home safe.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="f3115973ceae4d298900dbdd35ff1738" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I've been reunited with my students![etc:Wait frame="15"/] That
might never have happened without you,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f3115973ceae4d298900dbdd35ff1738" Scale="1"/]Thank you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you so very much!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="f07cac8e3e334475a19768ad83d7fd70" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]All I could hope for was the safe return
of my students...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank goodness
they're alright!
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="b5753f6e26ea4af1bf7c66d56d066aef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]"We really need your help!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5753f6e26ea4af1bf7c66d56d066aef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's how it all started...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It can be very
hard to say no to someone with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
um, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]enthusiasm.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5753f6e26ea4af1bf7c66d56d066aef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I agreed to be a supervisor for the club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so how could I say no to coming on this
field trip?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I always give in.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="e83632769ad448db85ee3bded104fcd9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Before break started,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the three of them
came to me and said...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e83632769ad448db85ee3bded104fcd9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]"Miss [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We'd love to take a field trip to
that new planet!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e83632769ad448db85ee3bded104fcd9" Scale="1"/]I was flattered that they came to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e83632769ad448db85ee3bded104fcd9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Although,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had to pay my own way, and
that's left quite a sizable dent in my wallet.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="4b3d8f83174d4b79b2971258d738a3ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm supposed to be the advisor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is far more independent and put
together than me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b3d8f83174d4b79b2971258d738a3ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]When I accompany the club to different
events,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it must be hard to tell who's the
teacher and who are the students.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="3ed2f51cb7594703be1bd1470da7004d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm the supervisor of the Planetary
Science Club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I actually teach ethics.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ed2f51cb7594703be1bd1470da7004d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I honestly don't know that much about
planetary science.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ed2f51cb7594703be1bd1470da7004d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]I'm just not that familiar with the subject.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's a little embarrassing...
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="b610ea663e5c484b9029fffd59a6e65b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I don't think she means to cause trouble,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] simply disappears sometimes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b610ea663e5c484b9029fffd59a6e65b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Before I can warn her,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] will be on
her case about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and I end up trying
to play mediator.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]awkward.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="ce9de4b13dc9476e9af0a30fa737f07f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] told me she wants to be a teacher
someday.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have a feeling she'll be better
suited to it than I am.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ce9de4b13dc9476e9af0a30fa737f07f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]She got upset when I said as much and
lectured me about saying such a thing in
front of a student.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I was right.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="788e04739976430983c9a9175a213519" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When the ship was about to crash, I was
frantic.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My memory of the whole ordeal
is spotty.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="788e04739976430983c9a9175a213519" Scale="1"/]I do remember up to the point where I let
my students escape. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I returned to the
ship's cabin...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="788e04739976430983c9a9175a213519" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Then there was a loud noise...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think that's
when I lost consciousness...
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="725237828abe4c3cab0786425af3ebdf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] calls me "[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Meeki[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's been a while
since I've had a fun nickname like that.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="725237828abe4c3cab0786425af3ebdf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gets upset with her.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] She insists
it isn't respectful enough,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but personally,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I kind of like it.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="4b1a559527ca455caf850308bb9cb944" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] polished a mineral she found here
on the planet and gifted it to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b1a559527ca455caf850308bb9cb944" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I've been feeling anxious about what will
happen when we get home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but holding
that rock helps me feel calmer.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="813a7d7fd79644259d6214500dc1049b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]Honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a teaching career was never
that appealing to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="813a7d7fd79644259d6214500dc1049b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But after all of this...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] After how I felt
knowing my students were safe again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've
decided to take my job more seriously.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="813a7d7fd79644259d6214500dc1049b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thank you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] This wouldn't have happened
without you.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="d47c6c16582e4186bc6f1fccec2bab7e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I became a teacher this year,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right out of
college.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I still don't feel like I
know what I'm doing half the time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d47c6c16582e4186bc6f1fccec2bab7e" Scale="1"/]And now I've put my students in danger...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d47c6c16582e4186bc6f1fccec2bab7e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Agh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] This is just so awful!
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="81ed748cb91f4b76bac5b726d8a2ed88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Before break started,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the three of them
came to me and said...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81ed748cb91f4b76bac5b726d8a2ed88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]"Miss [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal12"/]Mika[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We'd love to take a field trip to
that new planet!"[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81ed748cb91f4b76bac5b726d8a2ed88" Scale="1"/]I was flattered that they came to me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="81ed748cb91f4b76bac5b726d8a2ed88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Although,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had to pay my own way, and
that's left quite a sizable dent in my wallet.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="62f1d14c236444f8ac2b96867681b59d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm the supervisor of the Planetary
Science Club,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I actually teach ethics.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62f1d14c236444f8ac2b96867681b59d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]I honestly don't know that much about
planetary science.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="62f1d14c236444f8ac2b96867681b59d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]I'm just not that familiar with the subject.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's a little embarrassing...
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="89393eeeca814051b4cb1710118a3dc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If I get home safely,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] maybe I'll get my own
pet dog.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You seem like a great companion.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="54788d5274c94a73a304216b8ad5f7c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Seeing how hard you work to fulfill your
Rescue Pup duties inspires me to put
more effort into my own responsibilities.
SV012.SV012_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="b51520f602924e40b6fb945ff8fc9df9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]By the way...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]it struck me as somewhat
curious,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I think you and I look exactly
the same?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b51520f602924e40b6fb945ff8fc9df9" Scale="1"/]I've never believed such a mysterious
coincidence could happen.
